title: The Horror Challenge Volume II
description: This second volume of The Horror Challenge includes 10 short stories that will provide the thrills you seek in a good horror tale. This collection of stories includes, witches, monsters and even cannibals! You will find yourself wildly entertained with the stories created by JH Glaze in response to suggestions from his readers.Since The Horror Challenge stories are all suggested by reader input, this series is unlike any other ever created.
author: J.H. Glaze
